document.full_text: the boston bruins say they may have lost the first two games of the best-of-seven nhl stanley cup finals to the vancouver canucks, but that does not mean you should give them up for dead.
document.title: boston says they're down, but far from dead
lines_and_colors: the boston bruins say they may have lost the first two games of the best-of-seven nhl stanley cup finals to the vancouver canucks, but that does not mean you should give them up for dead.
